alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 3:46PM AKDT until November 06 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM AKDT SATURDAY TO 11 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds and heavy snow expected. Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 4 PM AKDT Saturday to 11 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with rain in Sunday. Strongest winds and worst conditions expected in the Bering Strait.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
